rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124305

self.title: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to test code for subject characteristics that are evaluated periodically to determine if they have changed.
name: Subject Status Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: The state or condition of being living or deceased; also includes the case where the vital status is unknown.
